alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Jefferson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 12:25PM CDT until August 24 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 125 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Maynardville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maynardville, Rutledge, Plainview, New Market, Strawberry Plains, Blaine, Luttrell, House Mountain State Park, Joppa, and Rose Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
